article: Everywhere, you will find "the white-haired boy", sometimes called "the fair-haired" boy.He gets special  _  , as if he were above everybody else.You will find him in school, in college, at home, or  _  you work. He  _  the girls happy by just smiling at them.He has the mark of  _  on him.
